title: Bourbonnais Completely Furnished  Short Term/Long Term Rental 1600.00
posting_body: ['Completely furnished apartments for short or long term corporate housing relocations.', 'Starting at 1499.00', 'Great quiet suburban location in Bourbonnais behind the Northfield mall, dining, shopping, and interstate I 57.', 'Near major companies CSL Behring and Nucor Steel.', 'Visit our website to let us know when you are looking to start renting.', 'www.dbjack.com', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Individually Controlled Heating and Air conditioning', 'Fully Furnished Kitchen', 'Dish Washer', 'Freezer/refrigerator', 'Range /Oven/ Rangehood', 'Garbage Disposal', 'Washer/Dryer in apartment', 'Master Bathroom', '2nd Bathroom', 'Lighted Ceiling Fans', 'Cable/Internet', 'Window Blinds', 'Carpeting', 'Walk-in Closets', 'Closet built-in organizers', 'Private Balconies', 'Excellent views', '2 Car Garages (extra cost)', 'Secure, private garage entrances', '8 x 10 individual storage sheds (extra)', 'Community Amenities', 'On-site leasing office', 'Grassy Back Yards', 'Quiet Surroundings', 'Private off Street Parking', 'Landscaping', 'Lighted Entrances', 'Secured Locked Entrances', '24 Hr. Surveillance camera System', 'Nearby Recreation', 'Shopping', 'Restaurants', 'Interstate access', 'Residents Website', 'Pay rent anytime 24/7 with personal resident portal', 'Free ECheck rent payments', 'Corporate rent checks accepted']
